name: Carla's Nightmares
description:
Help Carla's Dreams defeat the forces of nightmares and save all their friends in this casual adventure

3 Game Modes:
Campaign Mode for SinglePlayer
Multiplayer-Online Mode with Friends*
Survival Mode to test your skills!
Several characters to choose from (In addition to some secret characters)
Various enemies to face
System codes to unlock objects and other things

*Internet Connection Required

Alpha version finished (Oct 9 2018)
ATTENTION: THIS VERSION CAN INCLUDE BUGS
